name: On MSFT - Dark mode
description: Get right now the dark skin for On MSFT, also known as WinBeta (now OnMSFT.com).
additional_info: v0.2.3 (3th October 2019) : Some fixes v0.2.2 (22 March 2019) : Some fixes: support for more pages v0.2.1 (6 March 2019) : Some fixes: brighter texts and links, and dark search bar v0.2.0 (9 January 2019) : Some little adjustments: Now support 2019 version of OnMSFT v0.1.0 (2nd September 2018) : First upload
